data.persona: I am a farmer.  My family and I live right outside of the kingdom.  We will soon be harvesting.  After harvest, my sons and I will take our goods to the town to sell.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken Pen.
The chicken pen has wire cages situated on three different levels, with hay at the bottom for the chicken's to sit in. There lie small holes in the cages for the eggs to fall through and be easily harvested by the farmers. The old wooden walls of the chicken pen are beginning to deteriorate and show signs of age.
The chicken is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a clothes.

data.short_motivation: I am showing the chicken my appreciation for all the eggs it has provided me over the years
data.mid_motivation: I want to be respectful of the chicken since it is going to be slaughtered soon
data.long_motivation: I will be taking the chicken to meat market as part of the harvest so I can exchange it for goods to get my family through winter
